name: Frozen Colossus
base_effect: Summon a Flesh Colossus to crush enemies in the target area 3 times, dealing Frost Damage each smash. Enemies hit are afflicted with Major Vulnerability, increasing damage taken by 10% for 12 seconds.

name: Pestilent Colossus
base_effect: Summon a Flesh Colossus to crush enemies 3 times, dealing Disease Damage each smash. Enemies hit are afflicted with Major Vulnerability, increasing damage taken by 10% for 12 seconds.

name: Glacial Colossus
base_effect: Summon a Flesh Colossus to crush enemies 4 times, dealing Frost Damage each smash. Enemies hit are afflicted with Major Vulnerability, increasing damage taken by 10% for 12 seconds.

name: Flame Skull
base_effect: Lob an explosive skull at an enemy, dealing Flame Damage. Every third cast deals 20% increased damage and applies Burning.

name: Ricochet Skull
base_effect: Lob an explosive skull at an enemy, dealing Flame Damage. Every third cast bounces to 2 additional enemies and applies Burning.

name: Venom Skull
base_effect: Lob a venomous skull at an enemy, dealing Poison Damage. Every third cast deals 20% increased damage and applies Poisoned. Converts to Stamina.

name: Blastbones
base_effect: Summon a flaming skeleton that runs toward the nearest enemy and explodes on arrival, dealing Flame Damage to all enemies nearby. Creates a corpse on death.

name: Stalking Blastbones
base_effect: Summon a flaming skeleton that chases the target enemy. Deals 15% more damage to enemies under 50% Health. Creates a corpse on death.

name: Blighted Blastbones
base_effect: Summon a diseased skeleton that runs toward the nearest enemy and explodes, dealing Disease Damage and applying Major Defile, reducing healing received by 16%. Creates a corpse.

name: Boneyard
base_effect: Desecrate the ground at the target location dealing Frost Damage over 10 seconds. Corpses in the area are consumed and a corpse is created when the effect completes.

name: Unnerving Boneyard
base_effect: Desecrate the ground dealing Frost Damage over 10 seconds. Enemies in the area have Major Breach applied, reducing Armor. Creates a corpse.

name: Avid Boneyard
base_effect: Desecrate the ground dealing Frost Damage over 10 seconds. You can activate the ability again to create a corpse and deal additional damage.

name: Skeletal Mage
base_effect: Summon a skeletal mage that attacks the nearest enemy dealing Shock Damage over 16 seconds. Creates a corpse when killed or expires.

name: Skeletal Archer
base_effect: Summon a skeletal archer that attacks the nearest enemy dealing Physical Damage over 16 seconds. Converts to Stamina. Creates a corpse.

name: Skeletal Arcanist
base_effect: Summon a skeletal arcanist that attacks enemies with AoE attacks, dealing Shock Damage to all enemies in the area over 16 seconds. Creates a corpse.

name: Shocking Siphon
base_effect: Siphon energy from an enemy dealing Shock Damage over 12 seconds. Killing a target affected by Siphon will consume its corpse and restore Magicka and Stamina.

name: Detonating Siphon
base_effect: Siphon energy from an enemy dealing Shock Damage over 12 seconds. Killing the target causes an explosion dealing Shock Damage to nearby enemies.

name: Mystic Siphon
base_effect: Siphon energy from an enemy dealing Shock Damage over 12 seconds. Increases the Magicka and Stamina restored when the corpse is consumed.

name: Death Knell
base_effect: Increases Critical Strike chance against enemies below 25% Health.

name: Dismember
base_effect: Increases Physical and Spell Penetration.

name: Rapid Rot
base_effect: Increases damage done with damage over time effects.

name: Corpse Consumption
base_effect: Consuming a corpse generates 10 Ultimate. This effect can occur every 16 seconds.

name: Bone Goliath Transformation
base_effect: Transform into a bone goliath, increasing Max Health by 30000 for 20 seconds. Gain bash attack that deals Physical Damage and grants a damage shield.

name: Pummeling Goliath
base_effect: Transform into a bone goliath, increasing Max Health by 30000 for 20 seconds. Gain a bash attack that hits multiple enemies and grants a damage shield.

name: Ravenous Goliath
base_effect: Transform into a bone goliath, increasing Max Health by 30000 for 20 seconds. While transformed, you pulse damage to nearby enemies and heal based on damage dealt.

name: Death Scythe
base_effect: Swing a massive scythe in front of you dealing Magic Damage to all enemies hit. Deals 5% more damage for each enemy hit.

name: Ruinous Scythe
base_effect: Swing a scythe dealing Magic Damage to all enemies hit. Stuns enemies hit and sets them Off Balance. Deals 5% more damage per enemy.

name: Hungry Scythe
base_effect: Swing a scythe dealing Magic Damage to all enemies hit. Heals you for each enemy hit. Deals 5% more damage per enemy.

name: Bone Armor
base_effect: Wrap yourself in armor made of bone granting Major Resolve, increasing Armor for 20 seconds. Creates a corpse when effect ends.

name: Beckoning Armor
base_effect: Bone armor grants Major Resolve. Ranged attackers are pulled to you and apply Minor Maim to them. Creates a corpse.

name: Summoner's Armor
base_effect: Bone armor grants Major Resolve. Also reduces cost of summoning abilities by 15%. Creates a corpse.

name: Bitter Harvest
base_effect: Consume corpses near you to generate Ultimate. Each corpse consumed generates 6 Ultimate.

name: Deaden Pain
base_effect: Consume corpses to generate 6 Ultimate each. Also grants Major Protection, reducing damage taken by 10% for 3 seconds.

name: Necrotic Potency
base_effect: Consume corpses to generate 10 Ultimate each. Increased Ultimate generation per corpse.

name: Bone Totem
base_effect: Summon a totem of bone granting Minor Protection to you and allies for 11 seconds, reducing damage taken by 5%. Enemies near the totem are feared.

name: Remote Totem
base_effect: Summon a totem of bone granting Minor Protection. Can be recast to move the totem to a new location. Enemies near the totem are feared.

name: Agony Totem
base_effect: Summon a totem granting Minor Protection. Enemies near the totem are feared and enemies who activate the Pure Agony synergy receive additional damage.

name: Grave Grasp
base_effect: Summon skeletal arms from the ground dealing Magic Damage and immobilizing enemies for 4 seconds. Creates a corpse when effect ends.

name: Ghostly Embrace
base_effect: Summon ghostly arms dealing Magic Damage and immobilizing enemies. Applies Minor Maim, reducing enemy damage done by 5%. Creates a corpse.

name: Empowering Grasp
base_effect: Summon skeletal arms dealing Magic Damage and immobilizing enemies. Grants Empower to allies in the area, increasing Heavy Attack damage. Creates a corpse.

name: Death Gleaning
base_effect: When an enemy dies near you, gain Magicka and Stamina.

name: Disdain Harm
base_effect: Reduces damage taken while you have a Bone Tyrant ability slotted.

name: Health Avarice
base_effect: Increases healing received while you have a Bone Tyrant ability slotted.

name: Last Gasp
base_effect: Increases Max Health.

name: Reanimate
base_effect: Raise up to 3 corpses from the dead to fight for you for 60 seconds. Each undead ally deals Magic Damage per attack.

name: Renewing Animation
base_effect: Raise up to 3 corpses to fight for you for 60 seconds. Restore Health, Magicka, and Stamina for each corpse raised.

name: Animate Blastbones
base_effect: Raise up to 3 corpses as Blastbones that seek the nearest enemy and explode dealing Flame Damage.

name: Render Flesh
base_effect: Graft bone and flesh together to heal yourself for a large amount. Applies Minor Defile to yourself, reducing healing received by 8%.

name: Resistant Flesh
base_effect: Graft flesh to heal an ally and grant them Armor based on your Max Health. Applies Minor Defile to target.

name: Blood Sacrifice
base_effect: Sacrifice your own life force to heal an ally for a large amount. Costs your Health instead of Magicka. Cannot be used on yourself.

name: Expunge
base_effect: Remove up to 2 negative effects from yourself and restore Magicka and Stamina for each effect removed.

name: Expunge and Modify
base_effect: Remove up to 2 negative effects and restore Magicka and Stamina. Also grants Major Mending for 5 seconds, increasing healing done by 16%.

name: Hexproof
base_effect: Remove up to 3 negative effects and restore Magicka and Stamina for each. Removes an additional negative effect.

name: Life Amid Death
base_effect: Consume a corpse to release its spirit to heal allies in the area. Creates a corpse at your location.

name: Renewing Undeath
base_effect: Consume a corpse to heal allies in the area initially and then heal over 8 seconds. Creates a corpse at your location.

name: Enduring Undeath
base_effect: Consume a corpse to heal allies in the area. Healing is increased for each ally below 50% Health. Creates a corpse at your location.

name: Spirit Guardian
base_effect: Summon a ghostly spirit to guard you for 16 seconds. The spirit heals you every 2 seconds and transfers 10% of damage you take to itself.

name: Intensive Mender
base_effect: Summon a ghostly spirit that heals the lowest Health ally nearby every 2 seconds for 16 seconds. Transfers 10% of damage taken to itself.

name: Spirit Mender
base_effect: Summon a ghostly spirit that heals you and nearby allies every 2 seconds for 16 seconds. Transfers 10% of damage taken to itself.

name: Restoring Tether
base_effect: Attach a tether to an enemy dealing Magic Damage over 12 seconds. While tethered, you and nearby allies heal every 2 seconds.

name: Braided Tether
base_effect: Attach a tether dealing Magic Damage over 12 seconds. While tethered, you and allies heal every 2 seconds. Healing increased based on missing Health.

name: Mortal Coil
base_effect: Attach a tether dealing Physical Damage over 12 seconds. While tethered, you and allies heal every 2 seconds. Converts to Stamina.

name: Curative Curse
base_effect: Reduces the effectiveness of negative effects applied to you.

name: Near-Death Experience
base_effect: Increases Critical Strike chance for healing abilities while you or the target is below 50% Health.

name: Undead Confederate
base_effect: Increases Magicka and Stamina Recovery while you have a summoned pet active.

name: Rapid Mending
base_effect: Increases healing done.
